verses.roman:
manuṣyera veśa dhari' yātrikera chale
prabhura darśana kare āsi' nīlācale

synonyms: manuṣyera—of human beings; veśa dhari'-dressing themselves; yātrikera chale—as if pilgrims; prabhura—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; darśana kare—visit; āsi'-coming; nīlācale—to Jagannātha Purī.
translation: Dressing like human beings on pilgrimage, they all used to come to Jagannātha Purī to visit Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
